statements: SELECT * FROM high_potential_employees;
SELECT name, department FROM high_potential_employees WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT name, join_date FROM high_potential_employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM high_potential_employees WHERE performance_rating < 2 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM high_potential_employees WHERE join_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM high_potential_employees WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM high_potential_employees WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM high_potential_employees WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS num_employees FROM high_potential_employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating, MAX(performance_rating) AS max_rating FROM high_potential_employees;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT reviewer, feedback FROM performance_reviews WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT employee_name, department, performance_rating FROM employees ORDER BY performance_rating DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;

SELECT employee_name, department, feedback FROM employees JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id WHERE performance_rating > 3 AND review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees;

SELECT employee_name, reviewer FROM employees JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id WHERE reviewer = 'Manager' AND performance_rating <= 3 ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE performance_score > 8.0;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2022-10-01';
SELECT e.name AS EmployeeName, p.project_name AS ProjectName FROM employees e JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.id = ep.employee_id JOIN projects p ON ep.project_id = p.project_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE performance_score > 8.0;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, project_name FROM employees JOIN employee_projects ON employees.id = employee_projects.employee_id JOIN projects ON employee_projects.project_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date;

SELECT employee_name, performance_rating FROM employees JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id WHERE performance_rating > 4 AND feedback LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM Department ORDER BY dept_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM Promotion WHERE salary_increase > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY employee_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE performance_rating > 3 ORDER BY performance_rating ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reviews, employee_id FROM PerformanceReview GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_reviews > 2;
SELECT e.employee_name, p.promotion_date, p.new_role FROM Employee e INNER JOIN Promotion p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE p.salary_increase > 500;
SELECT * FROM TrainingProgram WHERE trainer='John Doe' AND duration_hours >= 20;
